First, we need to understand who Nicole Kidman is. She is an Australian actress and producer who has been active in Hollywood for several decades. 

Next, we need to understand what Scientologists are. Scientology is a religion founded by American science fiction writer L. Ron Hubbard. It has been the subject of controversy and criticism due to its practices and beliefs. 

Finally, we need to determine whether Nicole Kidman knows any Scientologists. There are several pieces of evidence that suggest she does. 

Firstly, Nicole Kidman was married to Tom Cruise from 1990 to 2001. Tom Cruise is one of the most famous Scientologists in the world and has been a member of the religion since the 1980s. 

Secondly, Nicole Kidman has talked publicly about her experience with Scientology. In a 2013 interview with Vanity Fair, she said that she had been "personally affected by Scientology" during her marriage to Cruise. She also said that she had chosen not to speak publicly about her feelings towards the religion and that "I have two children who are Scientologists - Connor and Isabella - and I utterly respect their beliefs." 

Based on this evidence, we can confidently say that the answer to the question is (A) yes, Nicole Kidman does know Scientologists.
